## PackageResource.update() method

Updates the information pertaining to a specified package (transaction).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
update(packageId: string, payload: Requests.UpdatePackageData): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |
|  payload | Requests.[UpdatePackageData](./onespan-sign-node.updatepackagedata.md) | Package information |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
